soccer.common

Class Game_Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.Game_Constants
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TOS_Constants

    public class Game_Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    This interface defines constants that are used in soccer rules and govern the simulation process.
    Author:
    vkyrylov
